awards.text: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: A lonely war veteran psychologically unravels ahead of an old friend's impending visit.
plot: A lonely war veteran psychologically unravels ahead of an old friend's impending visit.
title: Nightingale

tomatoes.consensus: Nightingale serves up a breathtaking solo performance by David Oyelowo in a film served well by its modest cinematic style.
